price: at ang sinumang gumawa ng kasimbigat ng isang katiting na kasamaan ay makikita niya iyon.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
